name: TrendChart
functionalRequirements:
## Trend Chart

### Purpose
Display velocity trends over time.

### Features
- Line chart with multiple series
- Time axis
- Velocity metrics
- Smooth curves
- Interactive tooltips
- Legend
technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- trendData: Array of time series data
- metrics: Array of metric names

### Chart
- ECharts line chart
- Multiple series
- Responsive sizing
